Package manager

Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
manager.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Interface used to process command lines in RunProject2.
Author:
Kenrick Eagar, Zachary Derish

    • validCommand

      private boolean validCommand(String input)
      Check to see if command inputted is a valid executable command.
      Parameters:
      input - String which will represent the command we will be testing for validity.
      Returns:
      will return true (boolean) if input is listed in command array, otherwise false.

    • handleOpenExceptions

      private String handleOpenExceptions(String[] input, AccountDatabase database)
      Method to try and catch possible exceptions encountered from standard input.
      Parameters:
      input - String array representing a single command line from system.in.
      database - object, the datebase that will store all Accounts.
      Returns:
      String indicating the potential errors.

    • runCommand

      private String runCommand(String[] input, AccountDatabase database)
      Given a command extracted from command line input, method will verify and run the specified command.
      Parameters:
      input - an array of strings representing a single line from system.in.
      database - AccountDatabase to handle transactions from.
      Returns:
      will return string indicating error or which command was successfully executed.
